home.title: The React Framework for Production
home.text: Next.js gives you the best developer experience with all the features you need for production: hybrid static & server rendering, TypeScript support, smart bundling, route pre-fetching, and more. No config needed.

features.title: The Web SDK
features.text: Next.js has all the tools you need to make the Web. Faster.

cards.title: Image Optimization
cards.text: <Image> and Automatic Image Optimization with instant builds.

cards.title: Internationalization
cards.text: Built-in Domain & Subdomain Routing and Automatic Language detection.

cards.title: Next.js Analytics
cards.text: A true lighthouse score based on real visitor data & page-by-page insights

cards.title: Hybrid: SSG and SSR
cards.text: Pre-render pages at build time (SSG) or request time (SSR) in a single project.

cards.title: Incremental Static Regeneration
cards.text: Add and update statically pre-rendered pages incrementally after build time.

cards.title: Fast Refresh
cards.text: Fast, reliable live-editing experience, as proven at Facebook scale.
